languages.text: "Я буду молиться за вашу душу, чтобы свет Императора коснулся ее и вернул в лоно веры". {n}Преподобный с тяжелым вздохом творит аквилу.{/n}
"I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я буду молиться за вашу душу, чтобы свет Императора коснулся ее и вернул в лоно веры". {n}Преподобный с тяжелым вздохом творит аквилу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I will pray for your soul — that the light of the Emperor may touch it and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The reverend sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
"I will pray for your soul — that the light of the Emperor may touch it and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The reverend sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
"I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The reverend sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
"I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The reverend sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
"I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
"I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

languages.text: « Je prierais pour vous, en espérant que la lumière de l'Empereur touche votre âme et la ramène parmi les fidèles, » {n}répond le prêtre, avant de pousser un long soupir en faisant le signe de l'Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je prierais pour vous, en espérant que la lumière de l'Empereur touche votre âme et la ramène parmi les fidèles, » {n}répond le prêtre, avant de pousser un long soupir en faisant le signe de l'Aquila.{/n}

languages.text: «Rezaré por usted. Que la luz del Emperador ilumine su alma y la devuelva al redil de los fieles». {n}El sacerdote suspira profundamente y hace el signo del Aquila.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Rezaré por usted. Que la luz del Emperador ilumine su alma y la devuelva al redil de los fieles». {n}El sacerdote suspira profundamente y hace el signo del Aquila.{/n}

languages.text: “我会为您祈祷，愿帝皇的明光照耀您的灵魂，让您重归信徒的怀抱之中。”{n}牧师重重地叹了口气，同时做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我会为您祈祷，愿帝皇的明光照耀您的灵魂，让您重归信徒的怀抱之中。”{n}牧师重重地叹了口气，同时做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたにお祈りします。皇帝の光があなたの心を照らし、信念を回復しますように」{n}司祭は大きくため息をつきながら、アクィラの印を結んだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたにお祈りします。皇帝の光があなたの心を照らし、信念を回復しますように」{n}司祭は大きくため息をつきながら、アクィラの印を結んだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich werde für Euch beten. Möge das Licht des Imperators Eure Seele berühren und sie wieder in den Schoss der Gläubigen zurückführen." {n}Der Priester seufzt schwert und macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde für Euch beten. Möge das Licht des Imperators Eure Seele berühren und sie wieder in den Schoss der Gläubigen zurückführen." {n}Der Priester seufzt schwert und macht das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n}

languages.text: "Sizin için dua edeceğim. İmparator'un ışığı ruhunuza dokunsun ve onu inananların yanına geri getirsin." {n}Rahip derin derin iç çekiyor ve Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will pray for you. May the light of the Emperor touch your soul and return it into the fold of the faithful." {n}The priest sighs heavily as he makes the sign of the Aquila.{/n}
